00029 bool CharTable::loadConfig(const char* fileName, MeCab::Iconv& iconv)
00030 {
00031     assert(fileName);
00032 
00033     // remove the previous tables if exist
00034     mapToLeft_.clear();
00035     mapToRight_.clear();
00036 
00037     // open file
00038     const DictUnit* dict = JMA_Dictionary::instance()->getDict(fileName);
00039     if(! dict)
00040     {
00041         cerr << "cannot find configuration file: " << fileName << endl;
00042         return false;
00043     }
00044 
00045     istrstream from(dict->text_, dict->length_);
00046     if(! from)
00047     {
00048         cerr << "cannot read configuration file: " << fileName << endl;
00049         return false;
00050     }
00051 
00052     // read file
00053     string line, left, right;
00054     istringstream iss;
00055 
00056 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00057     cout << "load char mapping table: " << fileName << endl;
00058     cout << "src charset: " << src << endl;
00059     cout << "dest charset: " << dest << endl;
00060     cout << "Left\tRight" << endl;
00061 #endif
00062 
00063     // each line is assumed in the format "LeftType RightType",
00064     // those lines not in this format would be ignored
00065     while(getline(from, line))
00066     {
00067         line = line.substr(0, line.find('\r'));
00068         if (line.empty() || line[0] == ';' || line[0] == '#')
00069             continue;
00070 
00071         iss.clear();
00072         iss.str(line);
00073         iss >> left >> right;
00074 
00075         if(! iss)
00076         {
00077             cerr << "ignore the invalid char mapping line: " << line << endl;
00078             continue;
00079         }
00080 
00081         // convert encoding
00082         if(! iconv.convert(&left))
00083         {
00084             cerr << "error to convert encoding for character " << left << endl;
00085             return false;
00086         }
00087         if(! iconv.convert(&right))
00088         {
00089             cerr << "error to convert encoding for character " << right << endl;
00090             return false;
00091         }
00092 
00093 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00094         cout << left << "\t" << right << endl;
00095 #endif
00096 
00097         // only insert when not exists
00098         mapToLeft_.insert(make_pair(right, left));
00099         mapToRight_.insert(make_pair(left, right));
00100     }
00101 
00102 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00103     cout << "total " << mapToLeft_.size() << " <=> " << mapToRight_.size() << " char mapping are loaded" << endl << endl;
00104 #endif
00105 
00106     return true;
00107 }
00108 
00109 const char* CharTable::toLeft(const char* str) const
00110 {
00111     CharMap::const_iterator it = mapToLeft_.find(str);
00112     if(it == mapToLeft_.end())
00113         return 0;
00114 
00115     return it->second.c_str();
00116 }
00117 
00118 const char* CharTable::toRight(const char* str) const
00119 {
00120     CharMap::const_iterator it = mapToRight_.find(str);
00121     if(it == mapToRight_.end())
00122         return 0;
00123 
00124     return it->second.c_str();
00125 }
